title: How Raytheon Is Using Hollywood Animators To Showcase Big Military Projects
text:
How Raytheon Is Using Hollywood Animators To Showcase Big Military Projects 
Published By: Fastcompany.com - Today 
The world's largest defense contractor has built an in-house team of movie animators, video-game designers, and comic-book artists.Everybody...
